title: Tumbling Oil Prices Give A Boost To Drivers During The Holidays
teaser: An OPEC meeting last week sent oil prices tumbling when the cartel decided not to restrict production to boost prices. Now some are predicting parts of the U.S. will see gas prices under $2 a gallon.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
